track.name: Ananda Nadamadum Tillai Sankara
comments: Jaya Jaya Shankar. I have the honor to have its compact disc (Who´s To Know) has many years. He is one of my preferring the side of Ravi Shankar. Its music is a gift of God. As the Hindus say: true music is between notes. To hear its music is a sacred moment with the universe. It blesses it to Krshna. Thanks a lot for you to exist.

Born in Almora in Uttar Pradesh, India, Shankar was the son of Amala and Uday Shankar, popular dancers, and also the nephew of renowned sitarist Pandit Ravi Shankar. Ananda did not learn sitar from his uncle but studied instead with Dr. Lalmani Misra in Varanasi.
